title: Verstappen nears historic F1 comeback - US GP takeaways
summary: Verstappen's double win in Austin moved him closer to a historic comeback while McLaren faced tough questions over its strategy and the fans were left to watch another processional race

qa_pairs.question: Which driver achieved a double win at the US Grand Prix in Austin?
What challenge did McLaren face during the US Grand Prix?
What type of race experience did fans have during the US GP?
wrong_options: An exciting battle for the lead
